Inmos employs 829 people, the majority of which are women. The average age of the employees is under 30. 150 of the staff have first class degrees in engineering or electronics and 3 have research degrees. Salaries for the employees of Inmos is better than for that of comparable companies. Employees have 23 days holiday a year. Chip fabricators work an 82 hour fortnight. Office staff work manual office hours. Shifts are 12 hours long. The only union recognised is the E.E.P.T.U. Most people travel to work by car.
